title: Christopher Lee - By the Sword and the Cross (2010) FLAC
description:
A symphonic metal concept album released in 2010 by actor and singer Christopher Lee. It tells the story of the First Holy Roman Emperor, King Charlemagne. The album won the Spirit of Metal award from the 2010 Metal Hammer Golden God awards ceremony.
